• A modest reduction in capital expenditures in our wireless segment of $4 million in 2019, compared to 2018, as we continued to focus our investments on the ongoing deployment of LTE-A technology, the roll-out of small-cells to more homes and businesses, the roll-out of FTTP to rural locations in Ontario and Québec and the roll-out of fixed WTTP to rural locations in Québec and Ontario
• A modest increase in capital expenditures in our wireline segment of $2 million in 2019, compared to 2018, as we continued to focus our investments on the ongoing deployment of fibre Internet, the roll-out of fibre Internet to rural locations in Ontario and Québec and the roll-out of fixed WTTP to rural locations in Québec and Ontario
